whyToScan.title: Why it’s important to use a virus scanner
whyToScan.description1: A potent virus can steal sensitive information like your credentials or passwords, encrypt and lock you out of your data, make individual transactions within apps, monitor your computer, and even attack other devices on connected networks. A virus has the potential to  access nearly everything that is locked away on your hardware.
whyToScan.description2: Once a virus has propagated onto your laptop or desktop, it can infect all your programs and applications without prejudice. Its destructive code can and likely will spread everywhere. That is why it is crucial to utilize a virus scanner.

freeScanner.title: A free online virus scanner you can trust

description.line1: Internxt has and will always put users’ privacy and security first. We are committed to creating a more fair, more free, and more transparent internet for all. That’s why we created our free online virus scanner, to shine a light on stealthy viruses and expose

description.line1: All our services are designed with the user's
description.line2: privacy in mind and we always make sure our
description.line3: services keep your data totally safe.
